metadata.title: 5374-1 -- libarchive vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that libarchive incorrectly handled certain archive files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo ua fix USN-5374-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libarchive-dev - 3.4.3-2ubuntu0.2 libarchive-tools - 3.4.3-2ubuntu0.2 libarchive13 - 3.4.3-2ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
